quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因词根“dis-+heart+-ening”字面推导为“伤心的/心碎的”，或混淆其与“heartening”（令人鼓舞的）的反义关系，忽略其“令人沮丧/泄气”的核心含义。
quiz_item.sentence: After working hard for months, it was **disheartening** to see that our project had been rejected without any explanation.

option.definition: 令人沮丧的；令人泄气的
